 The command ID number 0x0807. More...

 An integer telling the status of the command. This value is updated by the radio CPU during operation and may be read by the system CPU at any time. More...

 The trigger number of the CMD_TRIGGER command that triggers this action. More...
 
   uint8_t   pastTrig:1
 0: A trigger in the past is never triggered, or for start of commands, give an error
1: A trigger in the past is triggered as soon as possible More...
 
} startTrigger
 Identification of the trigger that starts the operation. More...

   uint8_t   rule:4
 Condition for running next command: Rule for how to proceed. More...

 Number of skips + 1 if the rule involves skipping. 0: same, 1: next, 2: skip next, ... More...
 
} condition
 
struct {
   uint8_t   bEnaFifo:1
 0: Do not enable FIFO in modem, so that received data is not available
1: Enable FIFO in modem – the data must be read out by the application More...
 
   uint8_t   bFsOff:1
 0: Keep frequency synth on after command
1: Turn frequency synth off after command More...
 
   uint8_t   bNoSync:1
 0: Run sync search as normal for the configured mode
1: Write correlation thresholds to the maximum value to avoid getting sync More...
 
} config

Detailed Description

Receiver Test Command.

Definition at line 287 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

Field Documentation

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::bEnaCmd

0: No alternative trigger command
1: CMD_TRIGGER can be used as an alternative trigger

Definition at line 296 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::bEnaFifo

0: Do not enable FIFO in modem, so that received data is not available
1: Enable FIFO in modem – the data must be read out by the application

Definition at line 307 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::bFsOff

0: Keep frequency synth on after command
1: Turn frequency synth off after command

Definition at line 309 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::bNoSync

0: Run sync search as normal for the configured mode
1: Write correlation thresholds to the maximum value to avoid getting sync

Definition at line 311 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

The command ID number 0x0807.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::nSkip

Number of skips + 1 if the rule involves skipping. 0: same, 1: next, 2: skip next, ...

Definition at line 304 of file rf_common_cmd.h.

uint8_t rfc_CMD_RX_TEST_s::pastTrig

0: A trigger in the past is never triggered, or for start of commands, give an error
1: A trigger in the past is triggered as soon as possible

An integer telling the status of the command. This value is updated by the radio CPU during operation and may be read by the system CPU at any time.
